trans-unit.source: Back in the Mobile App backend settings, click **Get started** > your client platform.
trans-unit.target: Back in the Mobile App backend settings, click **Get started** > your client platform.

trans-unit.source: Under **Create a table API**, select your **Backend language**, either **C#** or **Node.js**:
trans-unit.target: Under **Create a table API**, select your **Backend language**, either **C#** or **Node.js**:

trans-unit.source: Accept the acknowledgment and click **Create TodoItem table**.
trans-unit.target: Accept the acknowledgment and click **Create TodoItem table**.

trans-unit.source: This creates a new *TodoItem* table in your database.
trans-unit.target: This creates a new *TodoItem* table in your database.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] Switching an existing app backend to Node.js will overwrite all site contents.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] Switching an existing app backend to Node.js will overwrite all site contents.

trans-unit.source: Click **Download**, extract the compressed project files to your local computer, open the solution in Visual Studio, build the project to restore the NuGet packages, then deploy the project to Azure.
trans-unit.target: Click **Download**, extract the compressed project files to your local computer, open the solution in Visual Studio, build the project to restore the NuGet packages, then deploy the project to Azure.

trans-unit.source: To learn how to deploy a .NET backend server project to Azure, see the *Deploy the project to the web app* section of [Create an ASP.NET web app in Azure App Service](../articles/app-service-web/web-sites-dotnet-get-started.md#deploy-the-project-to-the-web-app).
trans-unit.target: To learn how to deploy a .NET backend server project to Azure, see the *Deploy the project to the web app* section of [Create an ASP.NET web app in Azure App Service](../articles/app-service-web/web-sites-dotnet-get-started.md#deploy-the-project-to-the-web-app).

trans-unit.source: In App Service, a Mobile App backend is equivalent to a Web app.
trans-unit.target: In App Service, a Mobile App backend is equivalent to a Web app.

trans-unit.source: You Mobile App backend is now ready to use with your client app.
trans-unit.target: You Mobile App backend is now ready to use with your client app.
